person.persName: Ferdinand H. Ragon (Trigg County, Kentucky, merchant.)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, merchant. Logan County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mildred C. Jameson Ragon in Trigg County, Kentucky, on August 5, 1847. Father of Thomas E. Ragon, Marian "Mallie" B. Ragon, Daniel S. Ragon, and Addie Ragon. Merchant in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1850. Merchant in Trigg County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1860. Merchant in Trigg County in 1863. Grocer in partnership with E. Dickey in Ragon & Dickey in Evansville, Indiana, in 1865.
